attributes.action: create a new Bank Holiday called Earth Day to sustain the increasing consciousness and action towards helping protect the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is now a real call to arms to protect our planet and having a Bank Holiday named Earth Day would give all citizens and companies a platform at least once a year to  come together in national and local community based environmental projects and encourage them to think how their actions can influence our planet and hopefully save it before it is too late.
